entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
